description: IRED-CD Investigation - Stage 4: CD loss with adversarial (opt_step) negatives, no Langevin
notes: Key ablation: CD loss (E_pos - E_neg) with adversarial opt_step negatives instead of Langevin. Diagnostic showed Langevin grad_norm=0.0018 (SNR=0.008) â€” chain is pure random walk because energy landscape has flat gradient wrt x. opt_step uses create_graph=True so model is trained to produce informative gradients. Tests whether CD loss itself is better than NCE when negatives are good (opt_step proven to work in q201 baseline). If this works but q202-q204 don't: Langevin is the broken piece, not CD. If this also stagnates: CD loss itself is the problem.
